name: Blossom
description:
Our plugin allows you to embed playable videos and other media as editable artboards in Figma for free.


With the free plugin you can embed:

  • Embed media directly into Figma from industry leading platforms such as YouTube, Loom, Chorus, Cloudapp and Twitter.


With a Professional subscription to Blossom:

  • Unlimited video and media embeds.
  • Upload your video recordings to Blossom, transcribe and edit into shareable clips in minutes.
  • Keep your shared research recordings secure with password-protected access
  • One place to manage all your video user research and recordings
  • Curate your insights into playable highlight reels to captivate your stakeholders and team
  • Publish presentations with playable videos directly from Figma that you can then share with your team via shareable links


Get in touch

Blossom is expanding everyday. Have a question or idea for us? Send it over to: team@tryblossom.io.
